name: bigcapital
description: BigCapital is a financial and business management suite that handles accounting, inventory, point of sale, CRM, and payroll. It is built to help small and medium businesses manage operations through a modular, self-hosted platform.

features.title: Complete Business Suite
features.description: Accounting, inventory, POS, CRM, and payroll in one platform. All-in-one solution

features.title: Financial Management
features.description: Comprehensive accounting tools for small and medium businesses. Professional bookkeeping

features.title: Point Of Sale
features.description: Integrated POS system for retail operations. Streamlined sales

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your business data and operations. Data sovereignty
